New Records: Jamie Leweling scored the winner on his debut for Germany against the Netherlands in the Nations League
Key Match Events: Jamie Leweling scored the winner for Germany in the 64th minute
The Dutch struggled to find any way into the game and failed to muster a shot on target in the first period
Xavi Simons and Donyell Malen had major chances to snatch a point for the Netherlands in the closing stages
Pre-Game Insights: Germany held a farewell tribute for Ilkay Gündogan, Manuel Neuer, Thomas Müller, and Toni Kroos before kick-off
A minute's silence was observed in memory of Johan Neeskens and Dieter Burdenski
Post-Match Reflections: Jamie Leweling said 'We won as a team. I scored but we played a good game and I am happy to have helped'
Germany are top of Group A3 with 10 points from four matches and are guaranteed a spot in the next round
Miscellaneous Highlights: Germany are top of Group A3 with 10 points from four matches
The Dutch are five points behind in second place
Italy's defender Giovanni Di Lorenzo scored twice in a 4-1 home win over Israel in Group A2
